Name: Dotted Scarf
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Electric-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Azurill, Marill, and Azumarill.  You can get a Dotted Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Azuma-Dew, an Azuma-Card, and a Stream Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
